subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: As the Red Sox held their first full-squad workout on Thursday, Manny Ramírez was not present while Curt Schilling said he would become a free agent after the 2007 season.
snippet: As the Red Sox held their first full-squad workout on Thursday, Manny Ramírez was not present while Curt Schilling said he would become a free agent after the 2007 season.
